meanings.definition: A mat placed on the floor of a bathroom to absorb water after a bath or shower.
meanings.sent1: I stepped on the bathmat after my shower to dry my feet.
meanings.sent2: The bathmat in the bathroom was soft and fluffy.
meanings.sent3: The bathmat slipped on the wet floor, trying to escape the water.
meanings.sent4: Her bathmat was like a thirsty sponge, eagerly soaking up the water droplets.
meanings.sent5: The bathmat's color faded over time from all the water it absorbed.
